main.name: Luca Carini
main.description: I am a full-stack engineer and I use react.js for the frontend development and Java / Kotlin / Laravel for the backend development
main.bio: Ehy, I am Luca, 25 yo software engineer from Italy. I love to keep learning new things, IT and non-IT (I'm learning French). Outside of work I love playing tennis, soccer and going to the gym (mens sana in corpore sano). I have a passion for languages, right now I can speak italian, english and spanish and french soon (I hope). I also love playing electric guitar (it helps me to free my mind). If you want to create something, contact me, I'll offer you a good coffee ;).
main.contactmessage: If you want to build a website or you have an idea and do not know where to start, write me!

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in learning new technologies, but these are the ones that I have used the most

education.description: Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

work.title: Software Engineer Specialist
work.description: Describe work, special projects, notable achievements, what technologies you have been working with, and anything else that would be useful for an employer to know.
work.technologies: Java 11/ JavaEE / Spring Boot / Kibana / Grafana / Kubernetes / Istio / Jenkins / Microservices / React

work.title: Application Development
work.description: Worked mainly in three industries, public and banking one. Public sector industry, implemented a java-based web app to to manage all orders for work uniforms Public sector industry, developed a system to manage all the new procurement contracts. Banking industry, developed a system for managing accounts and who, among the bank's customers, can afford a bank loan, following the client requirements.
work.technologies: Java 11 / Junit / Spring Boot / Kafka / Microservices Architecture / Mockito / API / Spring MVC / Javascript / CSS / Jsp / Oracle Database / Eclipse / Git

work.title: Consultant
work.description: Worked on implementing a scheduled java interface that runs on a Microsoft Server that manages an integration between the deloitte's ERP system and an external platform, to handle all the invoices' flow. The connection between the interface and the external system, was made by a SFTP connection. Worked on implementing a scheduled java interface that runs on a Microsoft Server that manages an integration between the deloitte's ERP system and an external SAP platform, to handle all the expenses' flow. During this project, I have worked closely with the data team, in order to create all the views/reports to allow the data analyst team to integrate everything with qlik. The connection between the interface and the external system, was made by a SFTP connection. Worked on implementing a new HR system, that allows all the people in the HR team manage the whole employer's lifetime, from the hiring process, to the resignation one. During this project, I have worked closely with all the HR team, in order to take all the requirements and managed the presentation of the software and the related UATs. Worked on a project that involves all the deloitte's IT team, the goal was moving from JDEdwards ERP to a SAP S/4 HANA. The team where I was scheduled, had the task of analyzing all the deloitte's internal flows (as-is) and then thinking how to integrate all of that with the new ERP's flows. During this project, we have worked closely with all the deloitte's Business Unit, in order to discuss with them on how the data will flow in the new system. We had to modify also the DB structures/procedures/views to maintain the correct functioning of the flows.
work.technologies: Java 8 / SQL Database / Relational DB / JDBC / Jsch / IntelliJ / SQL Server Management Studio/ Java Sring Boot / Thymeleaf / Javascript / Junit / Visual Basic Script / Microsoft Server / Mulesoft / Git

work.title: Junior Software Developer - Intern
work.description: Worked as a junior developer, helping the R&D team, implementing new functionality to the platform that the company has developed to manage and archive all the clients' invoices.
work.technologies: C# / Visual Studio / SQL Server Management Studio / Relational Database
